member.name: T:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture
member.summary: Node of tree of captures being a node of a data parsed tree (result of parsing data with a filter tree).

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.LengthOf(System.String)
member.summary: Length of array of child Capture's for the key. It is the same like [key].Length but more efficient.
member.returns: length of array of child Capture's

member.name: F:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.Value
member.summary: Capture string of this Capture.

member.name: F:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.Index
member.summary: Text position of the capture string of this Capture.

member.name: F:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.Length
member.summary: Length of the capture string of this Capture.

member.name: F:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.Key
member.summary: Key of this Capture. (Group name in the filter.)

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.ValueOf(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Value of child Capture's for the key and the index. It is captured string of named group of child filter.

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.ValuesOf(System.String)
member.summary: Values of last descendant GroupCaptures for the path. These are captured strings of named group of last descendant filter. It is almost the same like this.[key][index]...[key] but more efficient and safe. It is safe: ignores if some key is empty or some index is out of range in the path.
member.param: path specified in the following manner: "key[, index][/ key[, index]]...", where key is a group name of child filter, index is integer or '*'

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.FirstValueOf(System.String)
member.summary: First value of last-descendant Capture for the path. It is captured string of named group of last descendant filter. Used when an only value needed. If the path specifies array of values, the first one is returned. It is almost the same like this.[key][index]....Value but more efficient and safe. It returns null if some key is empty or some index is out of range.
member.param: path specified in the following manner: "key[, index][/ key[, index]]...", where key is a group name of child filter, index is integer or '*'

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.LastValueOf(System.String)
member.summary: Last value of last-descendant Capture for the path. It is captured string of named group of last descendant filter. Used when an only value needed. If the path specifies array of values, the first one is returned. It is almost the same like this.[key][index]....Value but more efficient and safe. It returns null if some key is empty or some index is out of range.
member.param: path specified in the following manner: "key[, index][/ key[, index]]...", where key is a group name of child filter, index is integer or '*'

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.CapturesOf(System.String)
member.summary: Array of last descendant GroupCaptures for the path. These are captures of named group of last descendant filter. It is almost the same like this.[key][index]...[key] but more efficient and safe. It is safe: ignores if some key is empty or some index is out of range in the path.
member.param: path specified in the following manner: "key[, index][/ key[, index]]...", where key is a group name of child filter, index is integer or '*'

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.FirstOf(System.String)
member.summary: Alias for [key, 0]

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.LastOf(System.String)
member.summary: Alias for [key, LengthOf(key) - 1]

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.ValueOf(System.String)
member.summary: Alias for FirstValueOf(path)
member.param: path specified in the following manner: "key[, index][/ key[, index]]...", where key is a group name of child filter, index is integer or '*'

member.name: P:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Child Capture's for the key.

member.name: P:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.Item(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Child Capture for the key and the index. It is almost the same like [key][index] but more efficient since does not build an array of strings. Also it is more safe in index use: returns null if index is out of range.

member.name: P:Cliver.DataSifter.Capture.Keys
member.summary: Keys of child Capture's. (Group names of child filters.)

member.summary: used by DataSifter

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Parser.build_node_name_tree
member.summary: Creates a tree of named groups so that each Capture to have a complete name collection independently on parse results. ALSO(!) it checks filter tree for group name uniquness within the same branch-level.

member.name: M:Cliver.DataSifter.Parser.get_next_level_group_names(Cliver.DataSifter.Filter[],System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Create a tree of named groups so that each Capture to have a complete name collection independently on parse results. ALSO(!) it checks the filter tree for group name uniquness within the same branch-level.

member.summary: Start level TlNodes collection. (!)Changes in this data will bring to error or incorrect parsing.

member.summary: Perform parsing.
member.param: text that is to be parsed with the tree
member.returns: Zero Capture that the tree of CroupCapture's starts from

member.name: T:Cliver.ThreadRunner
member.summary: Run a function as another thread, polls if it is working too long and then asks to break it. Used in GUI when a potentially time consuming operation is invoked.

member.name: M:Cliver.ThreadRunner.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.String)
member.summary: ThreadRunner constructor
member.param: time period in ms when ask to abort the thread
control whose mouse cursor will be changed to busy during running. Can be null

member.name: M:Cliver.ThreadRunner.Run(System.Object,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Run a function as another thread. (!)Function must be public.
member.param: instance of class hosting the function
member.returns: any return from the fuction. If it is void then = null

member.name: M:Cliver.ThreadRunner.Run(System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: Run delegate of a function as another thread. (!)Delegate must be public.
member.returns: any return from the fuction. If it is void then = null
